post.summary: Invites a user by sending them an email and registering invitation.

get.summary: Accepts users invitation and creates default (VIEW) role in invited workspace.

put.description: RoleBinding defines the roles and actions a user can perform. There are currently three roles (ADMIN, EDITOR, VIEWER). User must exist before you can update its RoleBinding. If you want to add a role binding for a user given the email address, call invite first to get a user id. Then call this endpoint.

get.description: RoleBinding defines the roles and actions a user can perform. There are currently three roles (ADMIN, EDITOR, VIEWER).
get.summary: Get RoleBindings for the calling user

get.description: RoleBinding defines the roles and actions a user can perform. There are currently three roles (ADMIN, EDITOR, VIEWER). The workspace path is based on the DNS such as (workspace1.app.keibi.io)
get.summary: Get all the user RoleBindings for the given workspace.

post.description:
Run a specific smart query.
In order to get the results in CSV format, Accepts header must be filled with `text/csv` value.
Note that csv output doesn't process pagination and returns first 5000 records.
Getting resource details by id and resource type

Getting all cloud providers resources by filters.
In order to get the results in CSV format, Accepts header must be filled with `text/csv` value.
Note that csv output doesn't process pagination and returns first 5000 records.
If sort by is empty, result will be sorted by the first column in ascending order.

organizationId.description: Nil if not part of an AWS organization

api.Filters.description: if you provide two values for same filter OR operation would be used if you provide value for two filters AND operation would be used

category.description: if you dont need to use this filter, leave them empty. (e.g. [])

location.description: if you dont need to use this filter, leave them empty. (e.g. [])

resourceType.description: if you dont need to use this filter, leave them empty. (e.g. [])

service.description: if you dont need to use this filter, leave them empty. (e.g. [])

sourceID.description: if you dont need to use this filter, leave them empty. (e.g. [])

tags.description: if you dont need to use this filter, leave them empty. (e.g. {})

sorts.description: NOTE: we don't support multi-field sort for now, if sort is empty, results would be sorted by first column

api.ResourceFilters.description: if you provide two values for same filter OR operation would be used if you provide value for two filters AND operation would be used

category.description: if you dont need to use this filter, leave them empty. (e.g. [])

location.description: if you dont need to use this filter, leave them empty. (e.g. [])

provider.description: if you dont need to use this filter, leave them empty. (e.g. [])

tagValues.description: if you dont need to use this filter, leave them empty. (e.g. [])

sorts.description: NOTE: we don't support multi-field sort for now, if sort is empty, results would be sorted by first column

result.description: result of query. in order to access a specific cell please use Result[Row][Column]
